item.title: Securing Cloud Resources: Assessing Internet Exposure for Enhanced Defense and Risk Management
item.description: Introduction Organizations increasingly rely on cloud resources to power their infrastructure and deliver scalable services. However, the internet exposure of these resources introduces security challenges that must be addressed to protect sensitive data and mitigate potential breaches. Assessing the level of internet exposure of cloud resources, such as Virtual Machines (VMs), Storage Accounts, Containers, and Databases, plays a vital role in fortifying defenses and safeguarding against potential breaches.
